column4: hi anyone here? have little question. trying to make app launcher in 9.10 so right click on desktop create new document put in this document name of the application then make it exe close right click on the desktop create launcher chose terminal app then name and command path to the script close. then when i press at the new created launcher it close immediately  why? there was an option in inetrpid not to close app after it starts in karmic none so
how stop terminal from closing after i press launcher see the terminal for second and it close. any advice?
when i type in the terminal name of this aplication it start without closing so how to stop launcher from closing this terminal after one sec
